page.title: 11A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I am a boy aged 11 living on my father's 250 acre farm on the{Wenlock {Edge,}called the Fegg Farm. In the holidays my day usually starts at 7am and before breakfast,which is at 8am. I help my father feed the fattening cattle with rolled barley and minerals added to it.After breakfast we go for a walk round the rest of the stock to check that they are all fit and well and within bounds.We see that some of the cattle have been getting out in to the next field.My father says we must go and patch up the hole in the fence so we return to the{farm}to collect the fencing equipment.After this we decide it is time for a cup of coffee. while we are drinking it my friend phones up to ask if he can come and play after lunch.He arrives about 2pm and we go out into the garden to play.
